Articles.Content: Thought i\'d make a first post and say hello. Found the game a few days ago and haven\'t played anything else since. 8)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Be sure to tell your friends about it (shameless advertising ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) ) it\'s going to be much greater in the future, enjoy!

Crash artists? That\'s a brilliant name for us! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome!
I thought it fit nicely, considering the most common thing for me so far has been crashes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
